description: Translate only rows where ospcomp is not empty. Note that none of these rows have nfl info so each polygon is either LYR or NFL.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Attribute does not occur
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100
No complex structure

Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Note that poly_type = 'FOR' when there is forest info, but any other poly_type is NFL, and when poly_type != 'FOR' ospcomp and uspcomp are always empty. So the max_layer_number for NFL row translations will be set to 3, however it will always return 1.
Attribute does not occur
Copies source value to CROWN_CLOSURE_UPPER
Copies source value to CROWN_CLOSURE_LOWER
Copies source value to HEIGHT_UPPER
Copies source value to HEIGHT_LOWER
Returns PRODUCTIVE_FOREST if formod is regular production forest. Returns NON_PRODUCTIVE_FOREST if formod is protection forest, or if polytype is brush and alder, treed rock, or treed wetland
Maps productive types from formod and poytype attributes. Note formod and polytype never occur together in the same row.

Validation-checks species string is not null, check there are enough species to return a value using the length of the string. String is trimmed to fix some error source data with leading and trainling spaces.     Translation - gets the requested species code and feeds the species name from the code into the mapping function that maps to casfri species using a lookup table.

Validation-checks species string is not null, check there are enough species to return a value using the length of the string. String is trimmed to fix some error source data with leading and trainling spaces.     Translation - gets the requested species code and returns the percentage characters.
